resource.chars:
induce us to call them metamorphic; for the name
might be applied for the same reason to Granite
& Syenite, or even to Lava, all of which have
probably undergone various mutations. It <s>will<\s> would
be <s>desirable<\s> better to restrict the term <u>metamorphic<\u>
to rocks of a sedimentary origin which
have undergone changes affecting their mineralo-
gical character since their deposition. It will
also add to the clearness of our language if
we confine the term <u>Slate<\u> to laminated
rocks of stratified origin & call the fissile
foliated rocks <u>Schists<\u>, in which manner
the two words have been used in this paper.
